favourite.article: Give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning Give me oil in my lamp, I pray Give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning Keep me burning till the day Say Hosanna Say Hosanna Say Hosanna to the King of kings
Fill us Lord Jesus! We open ourselves to You! We want to be saturated with You!

I thank the Lord that now we can enjoy such hymns. This hymns always reminds me of the 10 virgins and how I yearn to be part of the wise who had oil in their lamps and was able to meet the Bridegroom. Oh! Lord! Sisters and Brothers We need to burn now, we need the oil now not when we are dead and gone, we need to be awake. The only thing that can keep us awake is just to burn brighter and wait on the Lord. Amen!!!

We enjoyed this song today along with our morning portion. Rom. 12:11 Do not be slothful in zeal, but be burning in spirit, serving the Lord. Lord we give our vessels again today for the filling. Also Exodus 27:20=21; Life Studies of Exodus 114, 115 on lighting the Lamps.

We sang this in Sunday School all the time. The words were different though. The chorus was "Sing Hosana Sing Hosana, Sing Hosana to the Lord all day. Sing Hosana Sing Hosana, Sing Hosana to the Lord"
We have oil in our lampsâ€”we are burning! We are burning, burning every day! Turning, turning all the way! So our vessels we give for the filling. That our lamps may never, never die! Amen.

favourite.article: We are burning burning everyday! Lord, to the spirit keep us turning, turning all the way! Lord, turn us all the way... not half the way but all the way! Amen!

In preparation for Christ's return, there's a need to fill oil and keep burning everyday that lamp may never dies until His coming back. There's a need to fill Jesus and gain a reserve supply all the way.
This serves as my formula to be an OVERCOMER and to join with HIM in the wedding!
We have oil in our lamps we are burning! To the spirit, O Lord, keep us turning! Fill us Jesus! Come, Lord Jesus! We are turning turning all the way!
We want to pay the price for the oil. Amen.
